name: Echoes of the Ember Gate
summary: Ancient runes beneath a ruined elven observatory unlock a planar gateway that threatens to pour elemental fire into the Heartlands unless the heroes decipher the seals.

name: Vault of the Frostvein
summary: A lost dwarven vault buried within glacial caverns awakens a primordial frost spirit, forcing unlikely allies to brave the blizzard-haunted depths.

name: Whispers of the Shadowdusk
summary: A cabal of Shadar-kai warlocks sows despair across the frontier; only a band of subtle operatives can trace the whispers back to their bleak citadel.

name: Siege of Goldmantle Keep
summary: Devils loyal to an upstart archduke lay siege to Tarin's ancestral keep, and the heroes must fortify the walls, rally allies, and break the infernal war machine.

name: Labyrinth of the Mistwalker
summary: Portals bloom throughout the Emerald Vale, forming a shifting maze of Feywild echoes; the party must navigate riddles and bargains to reset the planar anchors.

name: Shards of the Tidebinder
summary: A leviathan-bound relic surfaces along the Sapphire Coast, and rival navies, sahuagin, and planar cults converge unless the heroes secure the tide shards first.

name: The Clockwork Wastes
summary: An awakened Netherese foundry begins spitting armored constructs across the Glass Dunes, forcing the party to delve the rust-choked warrens and silence its core intellect.

name: Masque of the Riftwalker
summary: A decadent infernal masquerade fuels planar tears above the capital; the heroes must dance among devils and unravel the contracts before the city dissolves into the Abyss.

name: Roots of the Thornwood
summary: Blighted worldroots strangle the Verdant Expanse, and the druids beg the party to trace the corruption back to a buried fey tyrant before the forest withers.

name: Citadel of the Dawnflame
summary: A marching citadel forged in Avernus descends to brand the mortal sky, and only a strike force of radiant champions can breach its heart before it crowns a new hellish monarch.
